name: The Kind Camomille
description:
The Kind Camomille

A wholesome 3D exploration game about random acts of kindness and the joy of discovery. Players take control of Camomille, a kind mouse on her way to her dear grandmother 100th birthday. On a relaxing and beautiful journey (that might not be so straight forward) she encounters people in need of a hand. Along the way, players can uncover small hidden sceneries, find goodies to put in her giftbasket and make that birthday even more special.

Key Features


  • A Colorful, Kind and Relaxing Adventure.
  • No penalties, no death, just take your time.
  • Collect hidden items for a (non-obligatory) 100% ending.
  • A short game (about 2 hours), focused on discovery and light puzzle solving.
